snippet.title: Announcing FARADAY PROTOCOL - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Even more announcements from Deck13 Spotlight? You bet! We're incredibly happy to announce that we're going to bring the First-Person Puzzle Adventure "Faraday Protocol" from Italian developer Red Koi Box to you all in 2021!

Make sure to wishlist the game on Steam to get notified about any updates and releases for Faraday Protocol! 👉https://store.steampowered.com/app/1107750/Faraday_Protocol/

________________________________________________________________________________________

Deck13 on Social Media:
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/deck13interactive

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Deck13_de
Indie Twitter - https://twitter.com/Deck13Spotlight
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/deck13interactive/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/deck13.interactive/
Discord - https://discord.gg/9SUYSSh
